editor.label: Application Server - IIS DeleteVirtualDirectory
editor.description: This procedure deletes a virtual directory from the specified web site.

formElement.label: Configuration name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the name of the configuration that holds connection information for the IIS server. (Required)

formElement.label: Absolute path of the script utility:
formElement.documentation: Provide the absolute path of the script utility used to execute this step. If only 'iisvdir' is entered, the 'iisvdir' tool must be located on the system path 'c:/windows/system32'. i.e: 'iisvdir' or 'c:/MyDir/IISFiles/iisvdir.vbs'. (Required)

formElement.label: Name of the virtual directory:
formElement.documentation: Provide the name for the virtual directory.

formElement.label: Path of the virtual directory:
formElement.documentation: Provide a path to the virtual directory within the web site of the virtual directory you want to delete. (Required)

formElement.label: Website name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the descriptive name, or the metabase path, of the web site for the virtual directory you want to delete. (Required)
